SELECT B.B_CODE, B.B_Ccode, B.Title, M.user_id, B.Content, B.BDATE, B.READCOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN Member M ON(B.User_CODE = M.User_CODE) WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.user_id LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Title LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Content LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
AND B.B_Ccode = #{boardCategoryNo}
ORDER BY B.B_CODE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Board B JOIN Member M ON(B.User_CODE = M.User_CODE) WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.user_id LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Title LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.Content LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
AND B.B_Ccode = #{boardCategoryNo}
ORDER BY B.B_CODE DESC
